cookies.title: Cookies for {{app}}
cookies.description: We are using cookies to give you a better expirence, collect statistics and to enable certain funcationality on the web site.
cookies.read_more: Read more on how we are using cookies

necessary.description: These cookies are necessary for the application to work and can not be disabled.

func.description: These cookies will enable enhanced functionality on the web site.

stats.description: These cookies allow us to count visitation statistics, to let us measure and enhance the performance of the web site.
